item.title: Emmys Snubs and Surprises: Jeff Hiller and Katherine LaNasa Score Unexpected Wins as Kathy Bates, ‘The Bear’ Shut Out
item.description: Britt Lower took the best drama actress award experts predicted would go to the ‘Matlock’ star in a historic win, while limited series actor fave Colin Farrell couldn’t escape the ‘Adolescence’ jugger

item.title: Katherine LaNasa Thanks Nurses That Inspired ‘The Pitt’ Character in First Emmy Win
item.description: The veteran actress won the award for best supporting actress, beating out a number of contenders from ‘The White Lotus,’ Julianne Nicholson (‘Paradise’) and Patricia Arquette (‘Severance’).

item.title: ‘The Pitt’ Star Katherine LaNasa Shot Such a ‘Disgusting’ Scene for Season 2 She Told Producer ‘He Needed to Give Me Some Diamonds’
item.description: “The Pitt” star Katherine LaNasa says the most challenging word she’s had to say on the medical drama was “campylobacter.” “It’s bacteria in poop or something. I don’t know,” LaNasa told me at S
